name: Puppy's
overview: An Italian platform game that consists of 24 sequential screens where you have to move your character, a nice puppy, using the joystick in port 2. In each screen you have to eat 10 fruits distributed on the floors of a house connected by ladders. Jump to avoid holes. Your enemies are 4 little birds that move horizontally. You can avoid them by ducking. Snakes and balls popping out from holes can be avoided by jumping over them. Note that snakes can slither at double speed.
